Function reference

version 0.8.7.9003

Main functions

Most usefull functions when starting with ReporteRs

Insert a FlexTable into a document object

  • addFlexTable
  • addFlexTable.docx
  • addFlexTable.bsdoc
  • addFlexTable.pptx

Add an external image into a document object

  • addImage
  • addImage.docx
  • addImage.bsdoc
  • addImage.pptx

Add a paragraph into a document object

  • addParagraph
  • addParagraph.docx
  • addParagraph.bsdoc
  • addParagraph.pptx

Add a plot into a document object

  • addPlot
  • addPlot.docx
  • addPlot.pptx
  • addPlot.bsdoc

Add R script into a document object

  • addRScript
  • addRScript.docx
  • addRScript.pptx
  • addRScript.bsdoc

Add a title

  • addTitle
  • addTitle.docx
  • addTitle.pptx
  • addTitle.bsdoc

Create Microsoft Word document object representation

  • docx
  • dim.docx
  • print.docx

Create Microsoft PowerPoint document object representation

  • pptx
  • dim.pptx
  • print.pptx

Write a document object

  • writeDoc
  • writeDoc.docx
  • writeDoc.pptx
  • writeDoc.bsdoc

  • Footnote

Functions specific to PowerPoint

  • addDate

  • addFooter

  • addPageNumber

  • addSlide.pptx

  • addSubtitle

  • slide.layouts

FlexTable layout

Main functions to manage FlexTable layout

add footer in a FlexTable

  • addFooterRow

add header in a FlexTable

  • addHeaderRow

set columns widths of a FlexTable

  • setFlexTableWidths

Span columns within rows

  • spanFlexTableColumns

Span rows within columns

  • spanFlexTableRows

FlexTable format

Main functions to format FlexTable content

border properties object

  • borderProperties
  • chprop.borderProperties
  • print.borderProperties
  • as.character.borderProperties

Cell formatting properties

  • cellProperties
  • chprop.cellProperties
  • print.cellProperties

alter FlexTable content and format

  • [<-.FlexTable
  • alterFlexTable

applies background colors to columns of a FlexTable

  • setColumnsColors

applies background colors to cells of a FlexTable

  • setFlexTableBackgroundColors

change grid lines of a FlexTable

  • setFlexTableBorders

applies background colors to rows of a FlexTable

  • setRowsColors

FlexTable rows zebra striping

  • setZebraStyle

FlexTable annotations

alter FlexTable content and format

  • [<-.FlexTable
  • alterFlexTable
